fetch

public ClientGetter fetch(FreenetURI uri,
                          long maxSize,
                          RequestClient clientContext,
                          ClientGetCallback callback,
                          FetchContext fctx)
                   throws FetchException
Description copied from interface: HighLevelSimpleClient
Non-blocking fetch of a URI with a configurable max-size (in bytes), context object, callback and context. Will return immediately, the callback will be called later.

Specified by:
fetch in interface HighLevelSimpleClient
callback - Will be called when the request completes, fails, etc. If the request is persistent this will be called on the database thread with a container parameter.
fctx - Fetch context so you can customise the search process.
Returns:
The ClientGetter object, which will have been started already.
Throws:
FetchException

fetch

public ClientGetter fetch(FreenetURI uri,
                          long maxSize,
                          RequestClient clientContext,
                          ClientGetCallback callback,
                          FetchContext fctx,
                          short prio)
                   throws FetchException
Description copied from interface: HighLevelSimpleClient
Non-blocking fetch of a URI with a configurable max-size (in bytes), context object, callback and context. Will return immediately, the callback will be called later.

Specified by:
fetch in interface HighLevelSimpleClient
callback - Will be called when the request completes, fails, etc. If the request is persistent this will be called on the database thread with a container parameter.
fctx - Fetch context so you can customise the search process.
prio - What priority to start at. It is much more efficient to specify it here than to change it later.
Returns:
The ClientGetter object, which will have been started already.
Throws:
FetchException

insert in interface HighLevelSimpleClient
isMetadata - If true, insert metadata.
ctx - Insert context so you can customise the insertion process.

addGlobalHook

public void addGlobalHook(ClientEventListener listener)
Deprecated. Use addEventHook(ClientEventListener) instead

Description copied from interface: HighLevelSimpleClient
Add a ClientEventListener. This name is misleading -- this hook not for the global queue. Use NodeClientCore#getFCPServer() for the global queue.

Specified by:

getFetchContext

public FetchContext getFetchContext()
Description copied from interface: HighLevelSimpleClient
Get the FetchContext so you can customise the search process. Has settings for all sorts of things such as how many times to retry each block, whether to follow redirects, whether to open containers, etc.

Specified by:
getFetchContext in interface HighLevelSimpleClient

getInsertContext

public InsertContext getInsertContext(boolean forceNonPersistent)
Description copied from interface: HighLevelSimpleClient
Get an InsertContext. Has settings for controlling the insertion process, for example which compression algorithms to try.

Specified by:
getInsertContext in interface HighLevelSimpleClient
Parameters:
forceNonPersistent - If true, force the request to use the non-persistent bucket pool.

prefetch

public void prefetch(FreenetURI uri,
                     long timeout,
                     long maxSize,
                     Set allowedTypes)
Description copied from interface: HighLevelSimpleClient
Prefetch a key at a very low priority. If it hasn't been fetched within the timeout, kill the fetch.

Specified by:
prefetch in interface HighLevelSimpleClient
allowedTypes - Kill the request if the MIME type is not one of these types. Normally null.

                     long timeout,
                     long maxSize,
                     Set allowedTypes,
                     short prio)

Prefetch a key at the given priority. If it hasn't been fetched within the timeout, kill the fetch.

Specified by:
prefetch in interface HighLevelSimpleClient
allowedTypes - Kill the request if the MIME type is not one of these types. Normally null.
